question: Which of the following Regulations is made under the PSS Act, 2007?
option2: Supervision of Payment and Settlement Systems Regulations
explanation: Under the PSS Act, 2007, two Regulations have been made by the Reserve Bank of India, namely, the Board for Regulation and Supervision of Payment and Settlement Systems Regulations, 2008 and the Payment and Settlement Systems Regulations, 2008. Both these Regulations came into force along with the PSS Act, 2007 on 12th August 2008.
